questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = \frac{x1 + x2}{2} $$ $$\text{equation } =  exp(x) × cos(x) -1.4 $$ $$\text{What is function value of 8th iteration using bisection method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = \frac{x1 + x2}{2} $$ $$\text{equation } =  exp(x) × cos(x) -1.4 $$ $$\text{What is root value of 8th iteration using bisection method?}$$
